thread.title: Pregnant Danielle Lloyd hits back at ex Jamie O’Hara and claims he’s ‘upset’ their three sons and only seen them once in 7 weeks after he branded her a ‘disgrace’ in bitter custody row
thread.title_full: Pregnant Danielle Lloyd hits back at ex Jamie O’Hara and claims he’s ‘upset’ their three sons and only seen them once in 7 weeks after he branded her a ‘disgrace’ in bitter custody row

author: Rebecca Pocklington
title: Pregnant Danielle Lloyd hits back at ex Jamie O’Hara and claims he’s ‘upset’ their three sons and only seen them once in 7 weeks after he branded her a ‘disgrace’ in bitter custody row
text:
TV Magazine 'THE BOYS WERE LET DOWN' Pregnant Danielle Lloyd hits back at ex Jamie O’Hara and claims he’s ‘upset’ their three sons and only seen them once in 7 weeks after he branded her a ‘disgrace’ in bitter custody row 
The model hit back at her ex husband after he claimed she had banned him from seeing his kids in a furious Twitter rant Exclusive
